reference.shortdesc: The link element defines a relationship to another topic or non-DITA resource.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The optional container elements for link (linkpool and linklist) allow authors to define groups with common attributes or to preserve the authored sequence of links on output.

p.ph: When displayed, links are typically sorted based on their attributes, which define the type or role of the link's target in relation to the current topic.

Links placed in a linkpool might be rearranged or removed for display purposes (combined with other local or map-based links); links in a linklist should be displayed in the order they are defined. Refer to those elements for additional explanation.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: , , keyref, and .
